mapper.update: UPDATE bpm_node_jump SET ACT_DEF_ID_=#{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_INST_ID_=#{actInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_NAME_=#{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_ID_=#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_ID_=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLETE_TIME_=#{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DURATION_=#{duration,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DURATION_VAL_=#{durationVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OWNER_ID_=#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLER_ID_=#{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_STATUS_=#{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUMP_TYPE_=#{jumpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK_=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENABLE_MOBILE_=#{enableMobile,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OPINION_NAME_=#{opinionName,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HANDLE_DEP_ID_=#{handleDepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_DEP_FULL_=#{handleDepFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE JUMP_ID_=#{jumpId}
mapper.select: SELECT jump.* FROM bpm_node_jump jump,bpm_inst inst where jump.ACT_INST_ID_=inst.ACT_INST_ID_ AND inst.inst_id_=#{instId} and NODE_ID_=#{nodeId} order by CREATE_TIME_ desc
SELECT jump.* FROM bpm_node_jump jump,bpm_inst inst where jump.ACT_INST_ID_=inst.ACT_INST_ID_ AND inst.inst_id_=#{instId} order by jump.CREATE_TIME_ asc
SELECT * FROM bpm_node_jump where ACT_INST_ID_ = #{actInstId} AND COMPLETE_TIME_ is not null order by COMPLETE_TIME_ desc
SELECT * FROM bpm_node_jump where ACT_INST_ID_ = #{actInstId} and CREATE_TIME_ > #{createTime}
SELECT * FROM bpm_node_jump where ACT_INST_ID_ = #{actInstId} and OPINION_NAME_ is not null and OPINION_NAME_ != '' order by CREATE_TIME_ desc
